body.bibl: Griffith, Sidney Harrison. “Christianity’s Historic Roots in the Middle East: Christians at Home in the ‘World of Islam.’” In Secular Nationalism and Citizenship in Muslim Countries: Arab Christians in the Levant, edited by Kail C. Ellis, 29–60. Minorities in West Asia and North Africa. Cham, Switzerland: Palgrave Macmillan, 2018.
